version_description: Optimization for devices experiencing performance issues
Optimization for devices experiencing performance issues

Free Fire - Battlegrounds just got better!

1. 4 man teams
2. New weapon and vehicle
3. Scopes (2x, 4x, 8x)
4. Proning
5. Auto-matching into random teams
6. Reduce RAM usage for all devices
7. Fixed most bugs reported by the community

Optimize CPU and RAM usage to solve an issue where some phones became too warm while playing
Optimized the size and position of fire button

Just when you thought Free Fire couldn't get any better:
1. The entire island has now been released
2. New weapon - Groza
3. Added aim assist to red-dot sights and scopes
4. Airstrikes have been added
5. Airdrops have been added to deliver rare weapons and equipment
6. Increased the number of players to 50
7. We figured it was time for a facelift so,we introduced an all new user interface
8. A bunch of additions for account progression (level-up rewards, anyone?)
9. Another bunch of quality of life improvements (sounds, footsteps, animations and the like)

1. Improved running animation
2. Resolved an issue which would cause some players to not receive their parachute
3. Optimized graphics
4. Added support for Japanese language
5. Resolved an issue where some stats in the profile would display incorrectly
6. Resolved an issue on sensitivity when firing

New Features
1. Introducing Diamond, Free Fire's paid currency
- Diamond can be used to purchase permanent items for your character
- Available in store: Man's Best Friend, Shifty Puss, Classic Leopard, Schoolgirl (Dark), Short Skirt (Dark), Beige Leather Jacket (male), Beige Leather Pants (male)

2. When you purchase diamonds for the first time, the following exclusive items will be given to you. These items are not available anywhere else in the game.
- Leather Jacket (Red)
- School Uniform (Red)
- Parachute Camouflage (Red)

3. New weapons available to loot in the map
- SKS - sniper rifle that comes pre-attached with 4x scope
- Pan - very short range, able to block bullets
- Parang - longer range than the pan, able to block bullets

4. HUD customization available inside Settings menu.
- We understand that no two people have the same finger sizes, so now you can make that fire button as big as you want!

5. Kick some squad ass with the new Guild system
- Form guilds with your friends to invite them to your squad as and when they come online.

6. Events! Complete events within the allocated time period to claim event rewards

7. New and improved weapons, backpack and looting HUD
- Icons have been enlarged to make them easier to click

8. Minimap will now indicate when your teammates are knocked down, firing, driving, and killed.

9. Minimap will now indicate when there are nearby moving vehicles

10. In areas with shallow water, movement speed of characters and vehicles will be reduced. Additional sound effects have also been added when near a shallow water zone.

11. Invite friends directly using Facebook and LINE

12. New costumes added to silver loot crate - Ragey Bulldog, Agile Puss, Crouching Tiger

13. New leaderboards sorted by score, kills, wins and will be reset every season

Balance changes/Optimizations
1. Updated our graphics to make it look more similar to a remote island. (Yup, we heard you guys loud and clear!)

2. Changes to how scoping works
- Revised the UI when scoping
- Crosshair will now change in colour when aimed unto an enemy
- Within your settings menu, you will be able to change the way you control your AWM. Our previous AWM controls have been re-introduced, by popular demand.

3. Changes to vehicles
- Vehicles now have their acceleration slightly reduced and are more affected by the uneven terrain of the map.
- Noise created by surrounding vehicles have been slightly lowered because the safety of your eardrums is our priority.


4. Removal of Christmas related skins and sounds
- As we step forward into 2018, we will be removing the festive sounds and skins and reverting back to the normal ones.

新功能
1.新角色-拉斐爾。
2.排位新階級-巔峰。
3.排位分數計算優化。
4.M79榴彈發射器調整為空投限定。
5.新增「毒霧」事件(經典模式-百慕達限定)。

New Features
1. Major graphic improvements to make gameplay look and feel more realistic
2. Bigger map - Sentosa island!
3. Ranked mode is now available for those of you who are more competitive. Exclusive season rewards await!
4. Swimming
Swim across to the new Sentosa Island, or you could just hide in the sea.
5. New character - Nikita the bodyguard
6. Callsign - customize how your nickname looks to other players
7. Mailbox - what better way to send you gifts?
8. Match history for you to revel in your past glories.
9. Continue spectating the player who eliminated you in solo games.

Balances and Improvements
1. iPhone X is now fully supported.
2. VSS, G18 and M1014 can no longer have any muzzle attachments.
3. VSS is now less easily detected by enemies, thanks to its built-in silencer.
4. Desert Eagle can no longer have any magazine attachments.
5. When destroyed, vehicles now lose control for a short time before exploding.
6. After exploding, vehicles burst into flames and deal area damage over time for several seconds to surrounding players
7. Vehicles now take damage for reckless driving.

1. Customer service for most regions
2. Bug fixes

New Features
1. All new character system
Play as four different characters, complete with their own stories for you to unravel as your play Free Fire. Level these characters up using gold and progressively unlock a passive survival skill for each of them. What's more, receive a free permanent character upon logging in.

2. New weapon - M249 machine gun
3. Throwable - grenades have been added into the game!
4. New vehicle - tuk-tuk
5. Added more rocks and forested areas to act as cover
6. New type of item in the store - bundles (with an all new Founders' Pack available)
7. 4 character-specific costumes with a special action button on the starting island
8. Name change is now possible in the profile page

Improvements and Fixes
1. Overall improvement on anti-hack detection & prevention
2. Optimizing speed hack detection
3. Optimizing multiple bullet hack detection
4. Optimizing wall hack detection
5. Suspension of accounts who use 3rd-party software on daily basis
6. Minor tweaks on durability of equipment
7. Overhaul of female character and her animation
8. Aim precision can now be toggled in settings
9. Guilds can now be disbanded
10. You can now add teammates who are in the same squad as friends
11. Stats of your teammates will be shown at the end of a game
12. Slightly reduced the size of the pan and parang

If you do not see the new update, try out the steps outlined below.
1. Open the App
2. Select "Updates" tab at the bottom
3. Pull to refresh to fetch the latest info about your apps
4. Tap the "Update" button on Free Fire

New Features
1. 40-man duo-only vehicular mode - Death Race!
Team up in this vehicle-only mode and collect power-ups. Can you, your teammate and your motorcycle survive till the end?
2. Disconnected players may now reconnect.
3. Food & energy system
Consume mushrooms scattered around the map to gain energy and regain HP over time.
4. Vaulting through windows is now possible.
5. New weapon - M79 grenade launcher
6. New marine vehicle - Amphibious Motorcycle
7. New character - Racequeen Misha
8. Loot box left behind by the enemies you slayed is now customizable
9. Customizable backpack
10. Air surfing - new option for users to skate while in the air

Balances and Improvements
1. Fixed a pesky issue characters could seemingly shoot from cover because they are right-handed.
2. Characters can now be upgraded to level 7.
3. Improved safezone mechanics so that illogical safezones will never appear.
4. 0-durability equipment now disintegrate
5. When picking up a new weapon, attachments from the old weapon will automatically be equipped on the new weapon.
6. View distance increased by 25%, players can now see enemies further into the distance.

This version contains mainly bug fixes and improvements.

Fixes and Improvements
1. Fixed a death race issue where sometimes the amphibious motorcycle would fall underground.
2. Fixed an issue where users would sometimes disconnect in squads.
3. Fixed an issue where the camera would vibrate.
4. Fixed an issue where the UI for creating an account and queue system would overlap.
5. Fixed an issue where some players could not play in squads.
6. Fixed a UI issue the wrong character avatar would appear during character select.
7. Friends list fixes, including unable to invite and fetch the stats of your friends.
8. Fixed an issue where players were unable to see their own match history, no match stats were lost due to this issue.
